attributes.action: Establish an anti-terrorism hot-line system to gather and collate suspicion reports from the whole public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police have an impossible task monitoring all the houses in the UK for suspicious terrorist activities. The general public can help by phoning in any casual observations which can then be correlated by police or MI5 software to establish patterns.
Civic duty would be discharged by phoning in once per suspicion. 
Repeat observation treated as new.

e.g. "I've got a 747 trainee here who isn't interested in take-off and landing"

Such reports should be solicited particularly from workers at sensitive sites, utilities, poisons, radioactive &c.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
